Modele

Class Carte

  • java.lang.Object
    • Modele.Carte
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Joker, SuitCards

    public class Carte
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the different types of cards used in the game, and their possible actions.

    It contains the constructors for its subclasses, SuitCards and Joker.

    Author:
    dinh_, tran_
    See Also:
    SuitCards

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Carte(int hauteur, boolean faceCachee, Conditions condi)
      This is the constructor for the Joker, since it doesn't have a suit, it needs a constructor that doesn't take suits as a parameter.
      Carte(int hauteur, boolean faceCachee, Conditions condi, suits enseigne)
      This is the constructor for the subclass SuitCards, it is used when creating a new SuitCard.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Carte

        public Carte(int hauteur,
             boolean faceCachee,
             Conditions condi,
             suits enseigne)
        This is the constructor for the subclass SuitCards, it is used when creating a new SuitCard.
        Parameters:
        hauteur - the face value of the card
        faceCachee - the state of the card, face-up or face down.
        condi - indicates the condition that enables the players to take this card as a trophy.
        enseigne - the suit of the card

      • Carte

        public Carte(int hauteur,
             boolean faceCachee,
             Conditions condi)
        This is the constructor for the Joker, since it doesn't have a suit, it needs a constructor that doesn't take suits as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        hauteur - the face value of the card
        faceCachee - the state of the card, face-up or face-down
        condi - the condition that enables players to take this card as a trophy

      • montrer

        public java.lang.String montrer()
        This method shows the card's name e.g "1 de Coeur" and it's value on a console command line.
        Returns:
        a line on the console command, either the card is face down and you can't see it, or it's face up and will return its characteristics.
